meanings.definition: The quality or state of being distant or reserved in manner.
meanings.sent1: Her aloofness made it hard to approach her at the party.
meanings.sent2: His aloofness at work often made his colleagues feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his aloofness, he still managed to make everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The cat's aloofness towards the new puppy was evident in her refusal to play.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's aloofness towards the students created a barrier to open communication.

meanings.definition: A disposition to be distant or reserved in manner.
meanings.sent1: The aloofness of the new student made it challenging for him to make friends.
meanings.sent2: Her aloofness was often misunderstood as arrogance by her classmates.
meanings.sent3: Despite his aloofness, he always had a kind word for everyone he met.
meanings.sent4: The aloofness of the mountain range gave it an air of mystery and grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The aloofness of the old oak tree made it seem wise and ancient.
